experience.title: Head Of Public Relations
experience.description: • Worked as a core member of The Entrepreneurship Cell to increase the reach of E-Cell through organizing talk shows, events, webinars• Collaborated with organizations, colleges, and social media groups and helped develop a culture of innovation and entrepreneurship amongst students• Overlooked a team of 40+ managers to track their activities and performance

experience.title: Marketing Intern
experience.description: Worked as a marketing intern to generate leads by partnering with colleges and clubs; recruited campus ambassadors and also performed market research
experience.description_html: Worked as a marketing intern to generate leads by partnering with colleges and clubs; recruited campus ambassadors and also performed market research <!---->

experience.title: Intern
experience.description: Interned with SWIGGY as the Campus CEO, to help with their growth and marketing in the VNIT campus regionDrove growth of order/day by ~ 70% through:• Optimising SWIGGY operations on campus by getting permission for SWIGGY night deliveries during exam season• Introducing special promotions and benefits for VNIT students to help increase SWIGGY’s market share over other competitors• Collaborating with the college canteen to open a SWIGGY food court that could cater to the students
experience.description_html: Interned with SWIGGY as the Campus CEO, to help with their growth and marketing in the VNIT campus regionDrove growth of order/day by ~ 70% through:• Optimising SWIGGY operations on campus by getting permission for SWIGGY night deliveries during exam season• Introducing special promotions and benefits for VNIT students to help increase SWIGGY’s market share over other competitors• Collaborating with the college canteen to open a SWIGGY food court that could cater to the students

experience.title: Summer Intern
experience.description: Worked on the various aspects of ‘Hydrocarbon Fluid Characterization’ through primary research and simulation by leveraging PVT sim software
